reviews.review_msg:
- The assignment criteria were unclear.
- The instructor was often passive-aggressive/cold.
- Points are deducted for reasons that don't seem fair
   |-> Aka, despite approving my topic choice initially, points were deducted for that topic upon submission....... :/
- The instructor often seems unsure about the content of her own lecture notes.

Lectures were super engaging and fun to listen to, Nerida made this course really interesting. Assignment criteria was clear, and exams were online multiple choice and open book long written questions. She was very kind and understanding, would definitely take a course with her again
